channel.title: Set google dns in windows 7 work station
channel.description: Hello. Tell me please. How can I change dns ? (For example google) I'm working on a Windows 7 work station.

item.title: Set google dns in windows 7 work station
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Sounds like you set yourself up for failure.

Why Windows? Why google DNS?

Anyhow. Not a Whonix specific question as per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle.

related:

  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Other_Operating_Systems
  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Computer_Security_Education#Windows_Hosts

Read full topic
